scripts.build-server: tsc -d && node_modules/.bin/rollup build/RpcServer.js --file dist/RpcServer.js --format umd --output.name RpcServer && dts-bundle --main build/RpcClient.d.ts --name RpcClient --out ../dist/RpcClient.d.ts
scripts.build-client: tsc -d && node_modules/.bin/rollup build/RpcClient.js --file dist/RpcClient.js --format umd --output.name RpcClient && dts-bundle --main build/RpcServer.d.ts --name RpcServer --out ../dist/RpcServer.d.ts
scripts.build: yarn run build-server && yarn run build-client
